# **Oli's Journal**

This is a template example for lab journaling. Students in the data science course at NIT will use this template to learn R for business analytics. Students can replace this text as they wish.

## How to use

1. fork this repository for this website and follow instructions on read me to get set up. [https://tuhh-w11.github.io/lab_journal_website/](https://tuhh-w11.github.io/lab_journal_website/)

2. Blog/journal what you are doing in R, by editing the Journal.Rmd. See the [Journal page](https://tuhh-w11.github.io/lab_journal_website/) for an example of what to do to get started learning R. Moreover, you can edit/add/remove files, that are listed in the navigation bar under class notes.

3. See the [links page](https://tuhh-w11.github.io/lab_journal_website//Links.html) for lots of helpful links on learning R.

4. Change everything to make it your own.
